oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams: Complete Works Volume 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of a number of performances of Hank Williams Sr. (singer/songwriter). Tape is part of a collection labeled Hank Williams: Complete Works. Tape is labeled as part three of eight. The tapes were donated from the M.G.M. Studios collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Baby We're Really in Love (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (02:35) Lost Highway (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (05:19) I Just Don't Like This Kind of Living (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (08:12) May You Never be Alone (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (11:02) Crazy Heart (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (13:31) I Can't Help it (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (15:59) I'm a Long Gone Daddy (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (18:50) They'll Never Take Her Love From Me (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (21:38) Why Should We Try Anymore (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (24:17) Rootie Tootie (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (27:07) A House Without Love (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (30:03) The Blues Come Around (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (32:53) Dear Brother (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (35:42) Lost on the River (Hank Williams Sr. and Audrey Williams) -- (38:20) Be Careful of Stones That You Throw (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (41:24) Why Don't You Make Up Your Mind (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (44:17) Pictures From Life's Other Side (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (47:12) I Dreamed About Mama (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (50:21) I've Been Down That Road Before (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (53:21) Just Waitin' (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (56:05) I'm Gonna Sing (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (57:58) Mother is Gone (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (1:00:39) The Angel of Death (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (1:03:15) Ready to go Home (Hank Williams Sr.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953. I saw the light;
